","additionalTicketText":"Pre & Post Show Happy Hour","ageLimitCode":"OVER_18","ageLimit":"18 and Over","showTypeCode":null,"showType":"","eventStatusCode":"BUY","eventStatus":"Buy","eventStatusMessage":"","ticketPurchaseUrl":"https://www.ticketfly.com/purchase/event/1277547?utm_medium=api","ticketPrice":"$20.00","externalTicketingUrls":[],"multiEventCartable":true,"facebookEventId":1036561909798448,"facebookEventIdString":"1036561909798448","headliners":[{"id":1628173,"name":"This Will Destroy You","startTime":null,"eventDescription":"On June 6th, 2006, Texas-bred instrumental rock ensemble THIS WILL DESTROY YOU unleashed their debut Young Mountain and never looked back. The album’s soaring guitar-lead dynamism, cascading cinematic passages, and jarring crescendos captured the hearts and minds of independent music listeners immediately upon release and has, a decade later, yet to loosen its grip. As Young Mountain celebrates its ten-year anniversary, a retrospective look at the six-track, thirty-six-minute composition shows quite clearly why it has always been considered a masterpiece by much of THIS WILL DESTROY YOU’s ardent international fanbase and still continues to permeate deeper into global consciousness to this day. No journey is understood or complete without a thorough examination of its point of departure. The band’s initial intention was never to press Young Mountain beyond their self-released, hand-made CDR batches made for live shows, content for the recording to simply remain a demo of their germinal efforts. Emphatically suggesting otherwise, Magic Bullet Records’ founder Brent Eyestone’s unrelenting enthusiasm convinced the original quartet of Christopher King, Jeremy Galindo, Raymond Brown, and Andrew Miller that Young Mountain should enjoy official CD and subsequent vinyl pressings (over a dozen and counting) and helped to amplify THIS WILL DESTROY YOU’s inaugural document far beyond the band’s humble aspirations. As a result, Young Mountain captures THIS WILL DESTROY YOU during a chronological window of youth, energy, and wide-eyed optimism that could never be replicated. A purity of sonic intentionality and unhinged vigor runs continuously throughout all of Young Mountain’s tracks, imbuing each piece with moments of both reserved fragility and glorious abandon that are decimated by walls of sound that could overpower jet engines. Founding guitarist Christopher King reflects on their collective naiveté at the time, saying “we didn’t know what we were doing but it didn’t matter. We had no preconceptions, no expectations.” Fellow founding guitarist Jeremy Galindo concurs, “...look what it has achieved...and it could have never existed...that is, still, the most interesting thing about the album to me.” Now, standing on the other side, we see that what began as an unassuming group of friends recording music in San Antonio, Texas, eventually moving North and solidifying in San Marcos, Texas was in fact the point of departure for a decade-long journey; one that would take THIS WILL DESTROY YOU across continuous tours over four continents, that would lead to international acclaim and a celebrated discography, and one that is yet to end.","isMobileFriendly":"false","image":{"jumbo":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-atjmbo.jpg","width":960,"height":484},"jumbo1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-atjmbo1.jpg","width":960,"height":484},"large":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-atlg.jpg","width":300,"height":151},"large1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-atlg1.jpg","width":300,"height":151},"medium":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-atmd.jpg","width":200,"height":101},"medium1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-atmd1.jpg","width":200,"height":101},"original":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-og.jpg","width":1270,"height":640},"small":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-atsm.jpg","width":100,"height":50},"small1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-atsm1.jpg","width":100,"height":50},"square":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-sq.jpg","width":100,"height":100},"squareSmall":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-sqsm.jpg","width":60,"height":60},"xlarge":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-atxl.jpg","width":500,"height":252},"xlarge1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-atxl1.jpg","width":500,"height":252},"xxlarge":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-atxxl.jpg","width":650,"height":328},"xxlarge1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/30/36/75-atxxl1.jpg","width":650,"height":328}},"youtubeVideos":[],"embedAudio":"","embedVideo":"","urlAudio":"","urlPurchaseMusic":"","urlOfficialWebsite":"http://twdy.tumblr.com/","urlMySpace":"","urlFacebook":"http://www.facebook.com/thiswilldestroyyou","urlTwitter":"http://twitter.com/tunnelblanket","twitterScreenName":"tunnelblanket"}],"supports":[{"id":1662071,"name":"Young Widows","startTime":null,"eventDescription":"Louisville's creatively restless dark-rock auteurs Young Widows have announced the impending release of their new full length Easy Pain, due May 13 via longtime label Temporary Residence, Ltd. Recorded with Kevin Ratterman (My Morning Jacket) the new set is far and away the trio's densest, most disturbingly addictive record yet. Easy Pain melds the strengths of their past and their tenacity for the future to forge an album perfectly befitting their merciless moniker; the lyrics and vocal delivery are more expressive and dynamic, the guitars are enormous, the drums are pummeling, and the trademark gut-churning bass is more jaw-dropping than ever. In the three years since the widescreen atmospherics of 2011's In and Out of Youth and Lightness, Young Widows set their sites on crafting a set of songs that brims with visceral ferocity. The results are so suited to the subsuming force of the trio's forceful live presence that the group recently debuted the album as a series of live performances in New York and Philadelphia, immediately galvanizing the support of their fanbase. Disregarding all boundaries and pushing forward with a masterful command of post-punk, noise rock, pseudo industrial, experimental doom, and goth, Young Widows emit the intimidating force of a 10-piece with the heart and soul of a classic power trio.","isMobileFriendly":"false","image":{"jumbo":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-atjmbo.jpg","width":400,"height":180},"jumbo1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-atjmbo1.jpg","width":400,"height":180},"large":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-atlg.jpg","width":300,"height":135},"large1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-atlg1.jpg","width":300,"height":135},"medium":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-atmd.jpg","width":200,"height":90},"medium1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-atmd1.jpg","width":200,"height":90},"original":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-og.jpg","width":400,"height":180},"small":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-atsm.jpg","width":100,"height":45},"small1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-atsm1.jpg","width":100,"height":45},"square":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-sq.jpg","width":100,"height":100},"squareSmall":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-sqsm.jpg","width":60,"height":60},"xlarge":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-atxl.jpg","width":400,"height":180},"xlarge1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-atxl1.jpg","width":400,"height":180},"xxlarge":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-atxxl.jpg","width":400,"height":180},"xxlarge1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/21/98/99-atxxl1.jpg","width":400,"height":180}},"youtubeVideos":[],"embedAudio":"","embedVideo":"","urlAudio":"","urlPurchaseMusic":"","urlOfficialWebsite":"http://www.youngwidows.net/","urlMySpace":"http://www.myspace.com/youngwidows","urlFacebook":"https://www.facebook.com/pages/Young-Widows/37160148471","urlTwitter":"http://twitter.com/youngwidowsband","twitterScreenName":"youngwidowsband"}],"urlEventDetailsUrl":"http://www.boweryballroom.com/event/1277547?utm_medium=api"}]}
